thread.title: Summerville, Fort Dorchester football games moved up to Thursday due to weather
thread.title_full: Summerville, Fort Dorchester football games moved up to Thursday due to weather

title: Summerville, Fort Dorchester football games moved up to Thursday due to weather
text:
Summerville, Fort Dorchester football games moved up to Thursday - WCIV-TV | ABC News 4 - Charleston News, Sports, Weather Member Center: Summerville, Fort Dorchester football games moved up to Thursday due to weather Posted: Updated: 
MOUNT PLEASANT, S.C. (WCIV) -- With a storm front moving into place over the Lowcountry and Hurricane Joaquin passing off the coast, rain totals for the Lowcountry range from several inches more than a foot of rainfall this weekend. That means schools are making plans to alter the Friday night football schedule. 
Already, two big games have been moved up to Thursday night: Summerville will play at Stratford at 7 p.m. Thursday while Fort Dorchester will play at West Ashley at 7:30 p.m. 
Other schools have said they are watching the forecasts closely and will make a decision on Friday night's games soon. 
Currently, the TruMoo Friday Night Rivals game between Goose Creek and Ashley Ridge is still slated to go on as normal. Stay tuned to ABC News 4 for the latest on game changes and weather information heading into the weekend. Most Popular
